data.name: Dusk Diver 2 DLC - Summer Swimsuit Set 2
data.detailed_description:
This content adds costumes for the 4 main characters(D.D./Bette/Raven/Vandak).
You can access it from the Lounge in Tumaz Mart.

※"Change Outfit" will be released as you progress through the game.
data.about_the_game:
This content adds costumes for the 4 main characters(D.D./Bette/Raven/Vandak).
You can access it from the Lounge in Tumaz Mart.

※"Change Outfit" will be released as you progress through the game.
data.short_description: This content requires the base game https://store.steampowered.com/app/1792600/Dusk_Diver_2/ on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Russian, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
